TRY ANY - INCL M/M 9-11 MOS PERIOD
EH GRABS

BUNKERS : 700 MT VLSFO + 130 MT LSGO
ADEN TRASIT - OK
CAN DO BOTH BH AND FH
CAN DO ANY DIRTY
+ + +
NAME: M/V SWANSEA
TYPE: BULK CARRIER
CLASS: BUREAU VERITAS
BUILT: 2015
FLAG: MARSHALL ISLANDS
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 63,310MT / 13.30M / 62.13MT
LOA/BEAM: 199.90M / 32.26M
GRT/NRT: 35,812 / 21,224
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 77,491.90 / 75,554.60
HO/HA: 5 / 5
GEARS: 4SETS X 36MT DECK CRANE + 4SETS X 15CBM GRABS
SPEED/CONS:  THE AFORESAID SPEEDS AND CONSUMPTIONS ARE GUARANTEED FROM BEGINNING TO END OF SEA PASSAGE, AT OPEN SEA, DURING GOOD WEATHER DAYS NAMELY, DAYS UP TO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (11-16 KNOTS ) AND TOTAL COMBINED (SEA AND SWELL) SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT CONFINED TO LIMITS MAX 1.25 METERS WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS AND NO CURRENT FACTOR, NOT EXCEEDING SUMMER DRAFT AND EVEN KEEL, EXCLUDING: ANY VOYAGE UNDER 36 HOURS DURATION, PERIODS DURING REDUCTIONS OF SPEED FOR SAFETY, SAILING IN PIRACY AREAS, IN CONGESTION, IN REDUCED VISIBILITY, MANOEUVERING OR SAILING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED WATERS, WHEN LOADED WITH DECK CARGO AND WHEN APPROACHING/ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS, RIVERS, CANALS, ETC. FOR A STEAMING PERIOD TO BE CONSIDERED A GOOD WEATHER ONE, ALL TIME FROM NOON TO NOON HAS TO BE IN GOOD WEATHER AS DEFINED ABOVE. PERIODS WHICH ARE NOT GOOD WEATHER AS DEFINED ABOVE AND/OR DO NOT COMPLY FULLY WITH THE ABOVE CONDITIONS ARE TO BE EXCLUDED FROM PERFORMANCE CALCULATIONS AND CLAIMS.
SPEED AND CONS;
BALLAST - ABT 14.0 KTS ON ABT 27.0MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2MT LSMGO
LADEN - ABT 13.5 KTS ON ABT 29.0MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED(WOG)

IN PORT CONS:
IDLE ABT 2.5MT IFO + ABT 0.2MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABT 5.0MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2MT LSMGO
ADA
+ + +
MV JOSCO DEZHOU
